name: International Passenger Data
description:
As trainline
I want to capture the customers name so that eurostar can reserve the seats for them.

As trainline
I want to capture customer details when there are multiple customers so that i can make reservations for the customer

As a customer
I want the experience to be easy with good instructions so that i don't get my details wrong in the reservation and not be able to travel

As a customer
I want to be able to enter my Membership id when i am booking so that i can get loyalty rewards form euro star

As trainline
I want to capture Membership id of a customer so that Euro star can add loyalty points to the customer account

As a customer buying a ticket for a child
I don't want the (Frequent Traveller) Membership input field, when i am booking as children (below 18) cannot have Eurostar loyalty cards
